Reviews.Title: nice laptop
Reviews.Author: Victor R. Rivera
Reviews.Content: It is pretty big.  The laptop is a good purchase for the price. The screen is a nice size. I give it like it.

Reviews.Title: Bought it for a first time user and it's great
Reviews.Author: Xo
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my mom. It's her first one. Easy to use. Big enough for her to see the screen and keyboard. Works great and has all she needs. It was very cheap as well. Totally recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: IT'S OK...
Reviews.Author: Francisco R. Morales, Jr
Reviews.Content: THE ONY ISSUES THAT I HAVE IS THAT THE INTERNET EXPLORE KEEPS CRASHING ALONG WITH ADOBE FLASH PLAYER. ALL IN ALL EVERYTHING APPEARS OK.
